name: Super Battle Fighterz
description:
CONTROLS
Controllers Required!!!
A - Jump Tap
A (In Air Hold) - Charge
B - Attack Rush
Y - Teleport Backstab
Right Bumper - Energy Ball
Left Bumper - Energy Cannon

DETAILS
A short Fighting Game created for a local game jam in Adelaide hosted by AIE. Made using Unity 2017 and art draw in Krita.

FOLLOW
Follow my personal twitter account for future info about this game and new ones aswell. @KingBit_Patrick
